about_the_game:
Julian’s Freedom 35 is here to give you 3500 liquor, Julian Cards, a Stolen ATM, 3 Epic Trunks, and some Hashcoins. That’s enough to upgrade this sh*thawk 3 times! The ATM also boosts the Casino’s profits. Deeeeeeeeecent!

Get 50 Julian Cards
Julian doubles the cash bonus for all Businesses!

Get 1 Epic Characters: Stolen ATM
The Stolen ATM gives you a cash boost x2 for the “Casino” business.

Get 15 Stolen ATM Cards
If you have 15 Stolen ATM cards, you can level up the Stolen ATM 3 times (if you have enough liquor).

Get 3 Epic Trunks
Each trunk includes 6 chances to get Liquor, Cash, Character Cards (Epic, Rare, and Common), and Business Cards.

Get 150 Hashcoins
With Hashcoins, you can buy Liquor and Trunks to open.

Get 3500 Liquor
With Liquor, you can renovate your Businesses and level up Characters Cards.

(You need to reach season 3 before you can claim your rewards.)

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
